title: Improving the Way We Shop Online: A Viget Exploration

description.short: E-commerce is still focused on buying rather than shopping. This exploration attempts to bridge the gap between physical and digital.
description.long: Whatâ€™s missing from the online shopping experience? Most of the experience itself, it turns out. E-commerce is still focused on buying rather than shopping. Digital agency Viget explores ways to bridge the gap between physical and digital.
